mapper.select: select * from eausermenupart where 1=1 and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and USERID= #{USERID} and USERID= #{USERID} and MENUID= #{MENUID} and MENUID= #{MENUID} and PARTID= #{PARTID} and PARTID= #{PARTID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and USERID= #{USERID} and USERID= #{USERID} and MENUID= #{MENUID} and MENUID= #{MENUID} and PARTID= #{PARTID} and PARTID= #{PARTID}
